abstract: Singapore’s first Prime Min Lee Kuan Yew is hospitalized for severe pneumonia.
lead_paragraph: Lee Kuan Yew, Singapore’s first prime minister, has been hospitalized for severe pneumonia, the prime minister’s office said Saturday.

headline.main: Singapore: Nation’s First Prime Minister Is Hospitalized
headline.print_headline: Singapore: Nation’s First Prime Minister Is Hospitalized

snippet: Lee Kuan Yew, Singapore’s first prime minister, has been hospitalized for severe pneumonia, the prime minister’s office said Saturday.
